attributes.action: stop all slaughter in the world
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i am a big animal lover and have 3 of my own pets. i dont like slaughter i like to see animals running free then being  killed i would love this to be stoped and i hope that it is. Just think of a animal running free having the time of its life then think of its last seconds of its life in a mincer. animals should die in a nice place and shud have lived a brilant life and been looked after.some people thinks its fun killing animals just for the moeny but a animals life is mutch more impotaner that moeny.PLEASE HELP STOP ALL SLAUGTER!(its your choice please help me try and stop it)

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
